text:
To start, my studies is a little mess, I just want to introduce myself, I'm a young black woman so in my personal and professional life black people inspired me so much, I think it's important to find people who seems just like you, I have so many inspirations for black people like Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont, this people fight for their rights in the Paris. My first model was the pastor Alex Dupont, his fight for black people rights was huge and he never stopped his fight always without violence. Besides, some members of my family of is a source of inspiration for me especially my mother, she left her family just for find a good job in Paris, I think it's thanks her, I know so many things about the history of black people in so many countries.
My family put me a pression for work in law because I'm from a family of politicians, my uncle is a great lawyer and so since my childhood I study the politic and the law. I was very sure to work in laws professions and my first choice for my professional career was to be a lawyer for the future but after one year on university studying, I realize the opportunities who was offer to me and know I study communication in the University of Rennes 2.
